WEDO_TEXT: What we do? We are a group of professional Cosmetologists & Estheticians. That are hard working and staying up to date with the latest trends and technology in the beauty industry to bring our clients the best experience possible. Gaia Evolution Spa & Salon was created with the concept of rescue the use of natural & organic sources from our professional lines...
SKIN_TEXT: Our goal at Gaia Evolution is to provide effective, natural skincare solutions that promote skin wellness and holistic health. Through our partnership with Aveda and Eminence, we prioritize the use of organic, vegan, and cruelty-free products, ensuring that our clients experience the best of natural skincare and beauty.
